about_the_game:
Human vs Food is a challenging action platformer game set in a world where food has taken over the world. In battle, you will have to destroy food a lot and skillfully. Explore 100 levels, play as 6 different characters with different skills. Save the world!

A long time ago, in a distant world where everyone lived an ordinary life, suddenly at night an unusual red moon appeared in the sky. As it was named by the locals "Red Moon of Death" that turned food that came under its rays into insane living murderers.

This world is now full of threats: you will encounter cheese-killer, an evil piece of meat and many other kind of crazy food. To win up over food, you need to find your own approach to each enemy! Fortunately, at your disposal there will be 6 strongest heroes from the world of people, ranging from an ordinary knight, a mercenary, an assassin and to a dark lord who sided with the people. Overcome your fear. Save your people. Take back your world!

Key features of the game:


  • Great musical accompaniment on every level

  • Different types of opponents, each of which needs its own approach

  • Visual style - pixel art

  • 6 different heroes

  • 100 - levels

name: Human vs Food

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final

short_description: Human vs Food is a challenging action platformer game set in a world where food has taken over the world. In battle, you will have to destroy food a lot and skillfully. Explore 100 levels, play as 6 different characters with different skills. Save the world!
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
